pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Computation of the t* Statistic of Bergsma and Dassios (2014) // Computes the t* statistic corresponding to the tau star population coefficient introduced by Bergsma and Dassios (Bernoulli 20(2), 2014, 1006-1028) and does so in O(n^2*log(n)) time. Can provide both the V-statistic and U-statistic related to the tau star measure depending on user preference.
